TopicTitle: How would work the interstellar system?

Articles.Content: I hope  that i wrote interstellar right.
I assume it would have various star systems scattered across an area light years away from each other.
I suppose he mean's like travel between them and map view

Well theres the interstellar engines like the daedalus project engine as seen in the trailer and the speculated torch drive, which may even use antimatter as propulsion.

For the map i think it will be like gta where you wont be able to see the star systems before you actually travel there, or there might only be limited information like how many planets and information about the stars and their distance.

It is not confirmed about how many star systems there will be but i speculate it will be between 7 - 10, possibly even higher or maybe lower.
I hope when going to other star systems it wont be like quick travel. that would be quite demising to the game. for it would make kerbal space program not feel so open.
